title: First Class Chillen
itunes:title: First Class Chillen
description:
Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see whats the craziest things our listeners have seen on public transportation after a video surfaced online of a man smearing human feces on a innocent woman. Also, we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners would leave their significant other to a first class seat after a story appeared on reddit about a man leaving his wife in coach to go to a first class seat. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man posting an offensive meme without reading the title.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see whats the craziest things our listeners have seen on public transportation after a video surfaced online of a man smearing human feces on a innocent woman. Also, we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners would leave their significant other to a first class seat after a story appeared on reddit about a man leaving his wife in coach to go to a first class seat. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man posting an offensive meme without reading the title.
